title: Suryoday Small Finance soars after gross advances jump 21% YoY in Q4FY22 - Business Standard
content: Suryoday Small Finance soars after gross advances jump 21% YoY in Q4FY22  Business Standard
description: Suryoday Small Finance Bank surged 11.16% to Rs 141.90 after the company's gross advances jumped 21% year-on-year and 4% quarter-on-quarter to Rs 5,072 crore in Q4 March 2022.
